class.name: VoxelEngine
class.brief_description: Singleton holding common settings and handling voxel processing tasks in background threads.

method.name: get_stats
get_threaded_graphics_resource_building_enabled
method.description: Tells if the voxel engine is able to create graphics resources from different threads. This will usually be true if the current renderer's thread model is safe or multi-threaded, but might also be false if the renderer would poorly benefit from this (such as legacy OpenGL).

method.name: get_version_edition
method.description: Tells the edition of the voxel engine, which is either of the following: [code]module[/code], [code]extension[/code]

method.name: get_version_git_hash
method.description: Gets the Git hash that was used to compile the voxel engine.

method.name: get_version_major
method.description: Gets the major version number of the voxel engine. For example, in [code]1.2.0[/code], [code]1[/code] is the major version.

method.name: get_version_minor
method.description: Gets the minor version number of the voxel engine. For example, in [code]1.2.0[/code], [code]2[/code] is the minor version.

method.name: get_version_patch
method.description: Gets the patch version number of the voxel engine. For example, in [code]1.2.0[/code], [code]0[/code] is the patch version.

method.name: get_version_status
method.description: Gets the version status, which may be one of the following: [code]dev[/code], [code]release[/code]

method.name: get_version_v
method.description: Gets the major (x), minor (y) and patch (z) version numbers of the voxel engine as a single vector. May be useful for comparisons.

method.name: run_tests
method.description: Runs internal unit tests. This function is only available if the voxel engine is compiled with `voxel_tests=true`.
